column4:
"Hey there adventurer! Welcome to the tavern.
 We have cold drinks & warm beds& and food that you can eat.";"But I can see that you're not here for just food.
 Your lot comes to me looking for rumors.";"I've heard talk of a slime wandering around the inn.
 I can't have it hurting my customers. Go take care of it!";[CHOICE:Accept the quest->action:set_flag:slime_quest_accepted][CHOICE:Ask for more info->action:set_flag:asked_for_info][CHOICE:Decline politely];
